features.name: Conversation Lifecycle Management
features.description: Soft delete, restore, and purge conversations. Includes trash functionality and history view.

features.name: Document Lifecycle Management
features.description: Soft delete, restore, and purge documents. Includes trash functionality.

features.name: Conversation Branching
features.description: Edit user messages and regenerate responses, creating new conversation branches. Includes branch markers and switch prompts.

features.name: History Page
features.description: Date-grouped timeline view of conversation and document history with restore/purge actions.

features.name: Project Trash View
features.description: View and manage trashed conversations and documents within a project.

features.name: Chat Interface
features.description: Real-time chat with streaming responses, citations, debug info, and follow-up suggestions.

features.name: Document Upload and Management
features.description: Upload PDF and TXT files, view ingestion status, categorize documents, and manage tags.

features.name: Project Management
features.description: Create, update, delete projects with role modes and export functionality.

features.name: Search Functionality
features.description: Search across documents and conversations with filtering options.

features.name: Settings Management
features.description: Configure LLM provider, model, API keys, and theme preferences.
